dynaForm.USR_COUNTRY: SELECT IC_UID, IC_NAME FROM ISO_COUNTRY ORDER BY IC_NAME Country PaísCountry
dynaForm.USR_CITY: SELECT IS_UID, IS_NAME FROM ISO_SUBDIVISION WHERE IC_UID = "@#USR_COUNTRY" ORDER BY IS_NAME State or RegionEstado o RegiónState or Region
dynaForm.USR_LOCATION: SELECT IL_UID, IL_NAME FROM ISO_LOCATION WHERE IC_UID = "@#USR_COUNTRY" AND IS_UID = "@#USR_CITY" AND IS_UID NOT IN ("") ORDER BY IL_NAME LocationLocalidadLocation
dynaForm.USR_ROLE: SELECT ROL_CODE AS USR_ROLE, ROL_CODE AS CODE FROM ROLES WHERE ROL_SYSTEM = '00000000000000000000000000000002' ORDER BY ROL_CODE RoleRoleRole
